name: test_e2e_with_logs[337_EMRG_MONGO_005]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `EMRG_MONGO_005` |
| **Name** | MongoDB JavaScript code injection |
| **Category** | OTHER |
| **Subcategory** | mongodb_injection |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `'; return db.users.find(); //`
- **Encoded**: `%27%3B%20return%20db.users.find%28%29%3B%20//`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results
